name: Slime Prince
description:
Reading what's beneath this is important, please do. 

FULLSCREEN IS RECOMMENDED TO PLAY THE GAME!! (click the blue resize button on the bottom right of the game screen, if the fullscreen view didn't work upon clicking the game)

GOAL

Move the cyan slime to the other side of the stage that are locked behind gates, the other slimes assist him to get there

DESCRIPTION     

Slime Prince is a puzzle game that revolves around the control switching between the slimes available in the stages. This game project was created for our university Game Programming course midterm examinations. 

CONTROLS ([HOTKEY] - ACTION)

  • [LMB] - SHOOT SOUL
  • [SPACE] - JUMP
  • [A/D] - MOVE LEFT/RIGHT
  • [R] - RESTART LEVEL
  • [ESC] - PAUSE GAME
